pages.text: Branches are like classes, but lighter. You can learn a branch by selecting a ability on the branch menu. You would need at least 3 experience levels to learn one and also, keep in mind that you can only learn one branch at a time.
To enter into the branch menu, you can use $(l)$(k:ancientclasses.menu)$() or enter by the shortcut below.

pages.title: Branch Anatomy
pages.text: Each branch have: $(list1)A passive which scales with the branch level which effect always apply.$() $(list1)4 abilities that consumes drumsticks or souls (Blue) $() $(list1)A 5th ability that does not consumes such resources. (Green)$() $(br) The branch level is the sumatory of the level of all abilities.
